testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open and the URL is entered............................passed When the valid username and password are entered............................passed And the Login button is clicked.............................................passed And the Settings link is clicked, followed by the Serv&Cat tab, then Category.passed Then the Category page text is validated....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Category Add Functionality
testcase.system-out: When the Add Category button is clicked.....................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the Category add page.................passed When all the necessary data is entered for the new Category and the Save button is clicked.passed Then the newly added Category is verified...................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Category Edit Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a Category is selected and the Edit button is clicked..................passed And the Category name is modified and the Save button is clicked............passed Then the modified Category name is verified.................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Category Delete Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a Category is selected and the Delete button is clicked................passed Then the Category should no longer appear in the list.......................passed
